entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Saint-Rémi
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:18 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.5°C

Observed at: Sainte-Clothilde 5:00 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

Wind: W 25 km/h gust 45 km/h

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero with frost. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low zero with frost. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the morning. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016
